data_table.description: The CAC Exam was conducted between 2009 and 2011. This dataset includes current use of aspirin, any nutritional supplements, and medications affecting blood pressure, lipids, diabetes, uric acid, and brain function.

variable.name: ASPIRIN1
variable.description: In the last month, have you been regularly taking aspirin -- I mean daily or every other day?

variable.name: ASPIRIN2
variable.description: Do you take aspirin because your physician recommended it, or on your own?

variable.name: meds_HYT
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: meds_LIPIDS
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: meds_DIABETES
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: meds_BRAIN
variable.description: Taking Medication that Affects the Brain?
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: meds_UricAcid
variable.description: Taking Medication That Affect Uric Acid?
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class

variable.name: meds_NUTRIENTS
variable.value: Not Taking Medication in Drug Class
